Class Pedestrian

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Pedestrian

public class Pedestrian
extends greenfoot.Actor

Pedestrian Class Moves mindlessly up the road, reacting to cars that hit it, ambulances that heal it, and potentially buses that pick it up.
